thread.title: Jets corner Darrelle Revis injured in Pittsburgh fight: report
thread.title_full: Jets corner Darrelle Revis injured in Pittsburgh fight: report

title: Jets corner Darrelle Revis injured in Pittsburgh fight: report
text:
Jets corner Darrelle Revis injured during alleged assault in Pittsburgh: report Jets corner Darrelle Revis injured in Pittsburgh fight: report NEW YORK DAILY NEWS STAFF  22 PM Darrelle Revis was reportedly roughed up in Pittsburgh. (Bill Kostroun/AP) NEW YORK DAILY NEWS STAFF  22 PM 
Darrelle Revis was roughed up during a fight in Pittsburgh’s South Side last weekend, according to local CBS affiliate KDKA . 
The Jets cornerback and former Pitt star was reportedly in town to visit his family and friends when a group of five people allegedly assaulted him. 
Revis’ lawyer told KDKA that he sought medical treatment after fearing for his safety. 
The 31-year-old signed a five year, $70 million contract to return to the Jets prior to the 2015 season. 
This is a developing story. Please check back for updates. Tags:
